short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a little tool i used to transfer my website url into my phone by using QR code technology.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This little tool will generate your current URL into QR code then you can use your phone to scan the qr for current URL and saved into your phone.
www.maxlibin.com
